text: YOU ARE AT THE WATER'S EDGE. IF YOU GO
ANY FURTHER, YOU'LL DROWN!
YOU STAND ON A BEACH. BEYOND IT LIES A
DARK LAKE, IN WHICH IS A SMALL ISLAND.
A SIGN ON THE DOOR READS: "BARRACKS"
BEFORE YOU STANDS A GREAT FORTRESS.
BETWEEN ITS PARAPETS LIES A DEEP MOAT,
AND A SIGN BY THE MOAT READS:
"BEWARE OF MOAT MONSTERS!!!"
HEAR YE THE WORDS OF L'KBRETH:
TO ALL WHO TRESPASS HERE, GOOD OR EVIL
I GIVE MY WARNING: NEITHER GOOD NOR
EVIL ALONE CAN TRIUMPH HERE.
THIS IS THE GRAND DINING ROOM OF THE
GRAND WIZARD. TO THE NORTH IS A LARGE
KITCHEN AREA. TO THE SOUTH IS THE
WIZARD'S OPULENT BOUDOIR.
A LARGE, DUSTY DESK STANDS AGAINST THE
FAR WALL. ITS DRAWERS ARE OVERFLOWING
WITH BOOKS AND PAPERS. INLAID IN THE
DESKTOP IS AN ORNATE LETTER 'P'.
I AM AROUND YOU ALWAYS,
BUT YOU HAVE NEVER SEEN ME.
YOU WOULD NEVER LEAVE ME,
BUT WERE I GONE,
YOU WOULD NOT CRY OUT FOR ME.
WHAT AM I?
AN ELEGANTLY DRESSED WOMAN WITH A WHIP
DEMANDS, "WHAT'S THE PASSWORD, BOYS?"
A SIGN ON THE DOOR READS "WINE CELLAR"
A GLOWING MESSAGE APPEARS IN MID-AIR:
S.E.G. PO'LE, GRAND WIZARD
THE WIZARD IS *OUT*    DO NOT ENTER!
I'D TURN BACK IF I WERE YOU.
HAVE YOU CONSIDERED ANOTHER DIRECTION?
AN AGED MONK APPEARS BEFORE YOU:
"IN EXCHANGE FOR YOUR SOUL, YOU MAY
HAVE WHAT YOU FIND IN THIS CHEST."
ABDUL'S ETHEREAL TAXI SERVICE
2500 GP ONE WAY
AN APPARITION BECKONS TO YOU FROM
ABOVE A MURKY POOL. OMINOUS SHADOWS
CAN BE SEEN MOVING IN THE DEPTHS.
"A GRAVEYARD'S DARK..."
"AND THIS TRAP'S A CROCK..."
"DON'T GO ANY FURTHER, OR..."
OURS IS AN UNEASY FRIENDSHIP.
YOUR FATHERS TOILED LONG TO TAME ME,
BUT EVEN NOW I WILL GO MY OWN WAY
IF YOU DO NOT TEND ME WELL.
I AM A POWERFUL DESTROYER,
YET MY FRAILTY IS GREAT.
WHAT AM I?
AN OILY BLACK LIQUID DRIPS FROM THE
CEILING, FORMING A POOL ON THE FLOOR.
A SHORT, SWARTHY MAN IN A TURBAN
SIDLES UP TO YOU AND WHISPERS:
"TELL THEM ABDUL SENT YOU"
LOOK OUT!
I AM ONE OF THE DECK OF SEVENTY-EIGHT,
AND VICTORY I FORETELL.
TWO BOLD STEEDS DRAW ME FORTH,
AND STARS SHINE FROM MY CROWN.
WHAT CARD AM I?
AN INSCRIPTION ON THE DOOR READS:
TEMPLE OF THE IRASCIBLE FUNG
PRIVATE!! NO TRESPASSING!!
ABDUL'S ETHEREAL TAXI SERVICE...GIVE
UP YET? STILL ONLY 5000 GP!
A SHORT, SWARTHY MAN IN A TURBAN
GREETS YOU, "MAY THE WINDS OF THE
DESERT BE AT YOUR BACK AND THE SUN
LEAVE YOU ALWAYS IN SHADE!"
"MY FRIENDS, I HAVE JUST THE THING FOR
YOU. A POWERFUL MAGIC CRYSTAL; A GEM
CONTAINING THE FIRE OF THE GODS! AND
FOR YOU, MY GOOD FRIENDS, A BARGAIN...
...ONLY 25000 PIECES OF GOLD!"
ABDUL OPENS A JEWEL ENCRUSTED COFFER,
AND MOTIONS FOR YOU TO LOOK INSIDE.
WITH A LOW CHUCKLE, HE DISAPPEARS.
A RADIANT STATUE STANDS BEFORE YOU,
ITS HANDS OUTSTRETCHED. IN ONE HAND IT
HOLDS A SHINING CRYSTAL SPHERE.  THE
OTHER HAND IS EMPTY.
FAREWELL. MAY YOUR WAY BE EASY.
BLACK FIGURE ON A BLACK HORSE,
HE CARRIES THE WHITE ROSE.
THE RISING SUN -- CHANGE WILL COME
IT FOLLOWS WHEREVER HE GOES.
WHAT CARD AM I?
ON MY ROLL, YOU MOVE FORWARD;
MY TURN IS YOUR TURN.
WHAT AM I?
YOU HAVE REACHED THE STATUE.
ABDUL SENT YOU
AIR
FIRE
DEATH
WHEEL
THE CHARIOT
